result.name: 1976-ongoing-shetland-oil-terminal-environmental-advisory-group-soteag-shetland-rocky-shore-tra2
result.notes: Biological surveys of rocky shore transects in the vicinity of the Sullom Voe oil terminal and reference sites outside the Voe. To provide a baseline for future assessment of gross change.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: 1976 - ongoing Shetland Oil Terminal Environmental Advisory Group (SOTEAG) Shetland rocky shore transect surveys

extras.value: ["This dataset can be made available depending on the purpose for which you are using the data. Please request from soteag@st-andrews.ac.uk and include a brief description stating the reason or purpose for requesting the dataset. If this data is to be used commercially, a charge will be incurred"]

Field Studies Council Oil Pollution Research Unit (originator); BMT Cordah (originator); Aquatic Survey and Monitoring Ltd. (originator); Data Archive for Seabed Species and Habitats (DASSH) (custodian)
